# Autofocus

Take pictures using autofocus.

1. Select single or continuous AF for **AF/MF SETTING > FOCUS MODE** in the shooting menu (ðŸ“– 92).

2. Use **AF/MF SETTING > AF MODE** to choose an AF mode (ðŸ“– 94).

3. Select **AF/MF SETTING > FOCUS AREA** and choose the position and size of the focus frame (ðŸ“– 96).

   !Focus Area Selection

4. Take pictures.
